messages.title: DON'T LET THE TORIES CONCRETE OVER COLCHESTER
messages.content: Feel that our town deserves better? ARE YOU FED UP WITH POTHOLES RUINING ROADS?

messages.title: Bob Russell will always stand up for our NHS
messages.content: Bob Russell and all the Lib Dems are 100% committed to our NHS. They are opposed to the Conservative's 'Hospital at Home' policy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to fighting against 'Hospital at Home' policy and keeping the existing Accident & Emergency services.

issues.health: Committed to our NHS and opposed to 'Hospital at Home' policy.

housing.content: Opposed to Tories concreting over Colchester, feel that our town deserves better.

leaflet.personalStatement: Bob Russell has a record of action. A promise of more...

quotes.text: Bob Russell has earned the right to be re-elected - Colchester deserves a Local MP

images.caption: Bob Russell - always standing up for our NHS

leaflet.additionalNotes: Recent opinion polls suggest it's a close race in the Castle Ward with Lib Dem leading at 48% and Conservatives at 33%.
